website_summaries.verdict: These placemats score top marks for their versatile combination of style and functionality that works for just about any occasion.
pros: We love how the attractive and elegant design is easy to dress up or down, depending on your needs
Tightly woven vinyl is durable and does a good job of protecting surfaces from scratches, rings, and heat
Available in a variety of colors and patterns

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! NOT heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the simple fact they said heat resistant, I put them down and put my plate down which for the fact was only warm NOT even hot and this happened to my table!!!!! Contacted the seller and was told they are heat resistant up to 150 degrees, and they are sorry..... SORRY my table is destroyed, and my food wasn’t even close to 100 degrees let alone 150!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I returned these placemats!
customer_reviews.text: These placemats were cut wonky. They had the look of woven fabric that is unraveling, and in other areas the weave looked stretched. The table runner and placemats arrived tightly rolled up and would not flatten! I was going to wash them to hopefully speed up the process by running them under warm water, but noticed the wonky and unravelling issues so rolled it all back up and returned them. I have since found a similar look from a different mfg here on Amazon and those arrived flat! Much better, and better quality. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D-M-R

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous however they're super thin and don't protect your table from messes. Any little thing you spill goes straight through the mat. I think these serve as decoration purposes only.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER PROOF
customer_reviews.text: Using these place mats on our wooden dining room table with guests. At cleanup time we lifted the place mat only to see rings on the wood from glasses sitting on the place-mat allowed condensation water from the water glass to pass thru to the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Vandolay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these because they are just as pictured and described. You can dress them up or down. They are not to thin but seem sturdy. They work for me. I chose the silver to go with my holiday decor and overall room design for after the holidays. The silver was perfect because it had a gray to it which makes it very versatile. So it picks up the gray in the room and the chair covers but the silver picks up the other decor in the room. love, love, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony/Kaydene Seay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and carefree, but spills will leak through.
customer_reviews.text: These placemats have the pros and cons of all vinyl woven mats. Pro - they look nice and come in all sorts of colors and patterns. I bought these to go with my new cabinets and floor color. They are washable and easy care. I have had other patterns in the past and they are still as good as new! Cons - things will drip through the small holes in the mat and you'll have to wipe off the mat and the table if something is spilled.
customer_reviews.author: alaffin

customer_reviews.title: edges weren't properly sealed; it was fraying by the next day.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot in good conscience recommend this product. Upon arrival, I noticed that the edges weren't properly sealed; it was fraying by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love these. The colors are indescribable like incandescent trees ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The colors are indescribable like incandescent trees in a forest. I love the little sheen in the Border. They look real yet wike up easily.I place them on top of a beautiful high-quality also vinyl tablecloth. They were so pretty that between uses I set the table and keep it sent until the next use which, because I am single can be quite a stretch. Two benefits - - the table always looks pretty when it's set, and no other male or laundry or other items get stacked on the table so it always looks nice in that room now. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: sweetsal

customer_reviews.title: Classy but for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my glass top kitchen table! The woven vinyl is not cheap looking and is great for everyday use. The color is fabulous and depending upon the way the light/sun hits the placemat, the colors appear to be changing (although they are not changing - its just the way the sunlight hits it).
customer_reviews.author: Demon reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and style (brown/bronzish)  though smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: The were smaller than expected though were the size stated, (I just failed to measure the ones I have already); other than that they were exactly what I expected. These are decorative placemats as they have tight meshlike holes in the weave so that any gravy, or small food particles will go through to the table and need to be washed out of the placemats. Suggest putting a paper placemat over them for children that spill alot of food. Basically just wash them in a sink of clean soapy dishwater, rinse, shake and let dry before putting them back on a wood table. Generally they can catch most foods and can be shook off and lightly wiped clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leia Sulee

customer_reviews.title: Love the placemats!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a reasonably priced placemat to use for Halloween and I just happened to see these. They were reasonably priced and I liked the plain black color (goes with Halloween decorations perfectly!), so I gave them a try and they were perfect! They are a very lightweight nylon, which means cleaning is easy - just rinse them in cool water and shake them dry. Great for a family with children or other messy people! In fact I liked them so much, I bought another set in red for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: K. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Good compromise between cloth and plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have glass on my table, so discolouring the wood isn’t an issue, but I don’t like the way dished clink on the glass. I prefer cloth placemats, but I also prefer something that doesn’t need washed after every meal. These are an excellent compromise. They don’t feel like the thick padded plastic placemats of my childhood. They can easily be carried to the sink and rinsed off, or even soaked if necessary. I’m not sure how much heat protection they would provide. Probably adequate for a plate of warm food, but I would be hesitant to place a hot dish or pan on it. I anticipate these having a long life.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Martin

customer_reviews.title: we needed these
customer_reviews.text: my husband had cloth placemats which he put away when people came over and i asked him why and he said he didn't want to get them dirty ! i was like, um, that's what they are for ! so i bought these for our kitchen and he loves them. they match perfectly and really are a cute design. clean up is a breeze, just rinse them under water. they hold up well to heat also. They are reversible so i think these will last forever. very nice quality mats and very nice price and selection.
customer_reviews.author: americancarol

customer_reviews.title: They also look as though they will clean up easily with a damp rag
customer_reviews.text: I received these placemats yesterday and used them for the first time last night. They look exactly as pictures in your offering. The color blue leans more towards turquoise and works very well with my room. I placed hot dishes on them and they are heat resistant as promised. They also look as though they will clean up easily with a damp rag. Very satisfied with my purchase and think they are priced fairly.
customer_reviews.author: Maries

customer_reviews.title: Love the look/Not Anti Slip or Slip Resistant
customer_reviews.text: I love the mats, how easy it is to clean and when something spills most of it gets caught in the mat very little soaks through to the table. The mats look really nice on the table, love the look and style, but I don’t like that it states slip resistance or anti slip and the mats move very easily, bascially all over my table. I was looking forward to anti slip because of my kids when they get off and on the table placemats slip all the time. I gave it 3 stars mainly for that anti slip reason. It states it but it’s not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Hold up through kids
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We're a family of six with four kids and so far these things are holding up well. No fraying or loss of color, or staining. Even with purple juice, spaghetti sauce, and markers. We bought two sets of these in red and black so we could swap them out when they get dirty. I can't attest to the heat resistance, since they're just plastic I make a point to keep hot things off of them, but for a normal dinner plate piled with hot food They do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joel & Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday placemats
customer_reviews.text: I like these placemats because they’re easy to wash and clean, and the black color is elegant and versatile enough to go from daily meals to formal dinners. Just beware that because it’s a woven style, anything that spills will go right through it to the table. In my case that’s not a problem because I have a plastic table cover and any spills or messes are easily wiped up. I like these and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TXLA

customer_reviews.title: Casual or classy versatility
customer_reviews.text: Really nice mats. They go with our casual or table covering great, but will work just as well with our more formal settings. Something about the patterned material and color give it a classiness that one cant get with most vinyl products (I’m still doing double takes.). Easy to clean and they stay in place on most surfaces (though not yet tested on cloth). Haven’t put anything hotter than a dinner plate on them, so unsure how heat resistant they are. But I’m super pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: lou e

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice for the price. They are sturdy enough that I can just throw them in the washing machine to clean them and it works great. What I don't like is moisture does get through them and on to your table so that defeated the purpose a bit. But they're the best looking ones I could find for the price (Walmart only had crap) and they do protect from heat and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena H

customer_reviews.title: A Kitchen Nightmare (sorry Gordon Ramsay these are worse!)
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the worse placements I have ever used, crumbs and water stains stick to it like if they're magnets. I have to wash them several times a week and still everyday they get dirty regardless. Its probably the material. I've bought some from the dollar general store and they don't attract food crumbs like these, its insane how prone they are!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: The champagne color looks great in my kitchen and on the table
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new dining table and I wanted to protect it from daily use. I found these place mats on Amazon. The champagne color looks great in my kitchen and on the table. I don't know how heat resistant they are. I don't plan to use them for anything other than under a plate or dish when eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: They look nice
customer_reviews.text: I notice now that the description does indeed say that the mats are not spill proof (I would have given one star had it not been in the description). What's the point of a place mat if it's not spill proof. I would not have thought to read the description to make sure it is spill proof before buying them. So, they look nice but that's it -- they are not at all useful or practical.
customer_reviews.author: rcr2017

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend cloth instead
customer_reviews.text: I had to get cloth placemats to put underneath because liquid goes right through, and it's hard to clean in between the tiny little holes. Would recommend cloth instead, especially if you have kids. Honestly I didn't know it was all holes, I thought it was solid and could easily be wiped off after every meal. They look cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie L. Falcone

customer_reviews.title: Great option to protect nightstand finish
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gold mats. They are the exact hue I needed-soft gold, not brassy or gaudy. I use these to protect the surface of my nightstands. They match my bedroom decor perfectly. The fine mesh texture is a nice contrast. I almost ordered mats from an expensive popular decor store but this gold color is a better match and a much cheaper option. This is saying a lot as I am very lucky about color and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Alwaysonthehunt

customer_reviews.title: Champagne Color Vinyl Placemats
customer_reviews.text: Love these champagne colored placemats. Made from a vinyl material. Does a great job protecting the wood table from food and drinks. Looks nice too! *My only complaint would be they are a bit difficult to clean when food gets stuck in the little woven cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Table runner
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that it hung down over the edge of my table but this was easily fixed as I just used a pair of scissors and cut to the desired size. The piece that I cut off I used on a small side table in my Livingroom. The color was just perfect as my chair cushions were a tan suede like and blended well with my table runner. My walls in my dining room are chocolate and my drapes are a bronze. It all blends well together. My table is glass and my hutch is light colored. It really pops on the chocolate walls. Sorry I don't have a pic.
customer_reviews.author: Kffair

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fast but as many other reviews have mentioned they were folded in half in shipping. This left a ridge in them and since the material is thinner than I expected they were not easy to remove. I eventually after three days was able to get them flat by placing heavy books on them. They look nice but are not metallic as pictured. Mine are more of a goldy beige. A little disappointed as I really wanted metallic gold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible to clean
customer_reviews.text: These look nice but with kids, these are terrible to clean. They show everything and even rinsing them in the sink does not get rid of the spots. Because these are interwoven, the spills stain and take forever to clean. I would find something different.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Non-Slip my Big Fat Foot
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this item is getting so many high marks. I've got a wood table, smooth surface; everything slides around. Bottom line, these placemats slide around too. They're supposed to be non-slip. Sheesh!
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Just one complaint
customer_reviews.text: I really like these placemats, great product for the price, they look nice enough to use for company but are easy to clean for kids. My one complaint is that tomato sauce stains don't come out easily never had this problem with cloth placemats but these are better with all other stains.
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Can I say that I love that these roll up and can be placed vertically in a cute bin on the table so that my kids use them🤗🤗 oh and my hubby complimented them ...win l. They clean you easy and so far so great, I have not put anything majorly hot on them.besides meals but they so far a hit.
customer_reviews.author: ANBJW🦋

customer_reviews.title: Smells like burnt chemical, cheap plastic, bad mesh, you can see your fingers one foot away
customer_reviews.text: Smells like burnt chemical, cheap plastic, bad see-through mesh, you can see your fingers one foot away. Will not recommend this item. Will not buy again. Returned them for fear they will cause cancer due to very strong chemical smell right out of the plastic enclosure tomb. Horrible product! Don't waste your money. Take my advice. Buy 100% cotton place mats at near the same price
customer_reviews.author: Princess Joy King

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color (kind of a light golden), texture, and the material they are made from. Only issue was it wasn't clear that the type of fabric/vinyl, allows liquid spills and crumbs through to other side. It's more of a mesh. They look really good on the dark wood table I have,.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Feldstein

customer_reviews.title: I need more crumb catching
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the image and seemed great. They seemed to be heat resistant which is always nice. My only complaint is with this type of placemat. The holes allow for crumbs and salt to fall through so it ended up being a little more work than it's worth with 2 kids and a messy man. I went back to cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not what they claim to be
customer_reviews.text: These look nice when you first buy them, but everything they claim to be is false. They are not easy to clean. In fact, all of mine have stains on them, which I cannot remove with dish soap and water. I purchased these in December, and now I have to throw them away. I would not purchase these ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Crap mats!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a whole year you write this. They are nice to look at and that's it. I figure these would hold up well against my kids and they did not. I also had 2 that frayed over time so once it frays they just fall apart. They also don't clean well. I would move on and find better placemats.
customer_reviews.author: Livi Harkless

customer_reviews.title: Great product, price and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and love them!! I have small kids so the fact that you can rinse and dry these to clean them is amazing! I was so tired of washing my old placemats every time my kids spilled something. The color is true to the picture. I haven’t placed anything super hot on them other than a warm dinner plate and it didn’t mess up my table at all. I will be ordering more in a different color as wel as the runner. Great option especially for the price! Plus I received these in half the estimated time.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like these. Wish there was some sort of skid resistance on the back but the color turned out great! Ordered the white but they are grey which is exactly what I wanted. Picture is them on a brown table. So far, I would recommend and great for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: So Cute and Super Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the fall season, they are the right touch to begin the fall festivities. They're holding up very well, I have no complaints about these place mats. They are very cute and match so well. They are easy to clean and don't require too much work. They don't slide around on our table which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Hard To Clean
customer_reviews.text: These have holes in them so it makes them hard to clean. But if you don't plan on eating on them they make great decorations. I don't know about heat because I don't put anything hot on them but like i said they are good for your dollar but hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: munchie8209

customer_reviews.title: Seem good but plasticky
customer_reviews.text: Seem good for basic use. Ive had microwaved dishes on it. But because it feels a bit plasticky im nervous to have anything hotter than a bowl out of the microwave on it. But havent had any issues with melting or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Jey!

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I missed the Vinyl in the description, that makes so much more sense now for what I got...They have a bit of a plastic/rubber look and feel to them, but at the same time somewhat fabric looking. I needed 6 matching place mats and so this was an ideal find. They look fairly cheap in my opinion but I wasn't expecting fancy so I'm not upset. They will work great for the needs I have.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning these. They got 2 stars only for beauty, they look nice but are VERY flimsy and thin when you get them. If they were double the thickness i would have kept them. you can see through them that's how thin they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Look great! Good value
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new dining table and wanted to update my place settings to match. These did the trick! Light, neutral color goes with just about everything, they look nice and (so far) have been easy to keep clean just with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: it is functional and does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice color and looks pretty. I am glad I got a set of 6 as I had company this weekend. It survived pizza and other things. I haven't had to wash them yet. I have no idea if they will last or not. I only used them for 1 week myself and my kids and grand daughter for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Merritt G Claude

customer_reviews.title: Great value, awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't use place mats but we purchased a new table and wanted to make sure it lasts us a long time. I bought these placemats because the color matched perfectly with my dining table. I love the versatility and easy cleaning of these mats. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: it leaks. Think you spill some soap and expect it to prevent the soap keep leaking to the table cloth. But there are holes in this mat and the soap will directly go to the table cloth. It does not meet my expectation as a dinning mat.
customer_reviews.author: Shuting Xiang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful placemats at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a placemat that looked great but also easy to clean. I didn’t want a cloth type. The are beautiful! And for the price I love them even more. I bought the 6 per package but am only showing 4. The gray looks so nice and has a shine to it. (Btw, I liked them so much a bought another set just in case of those stubborn stains that may come.) Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Not non-slip as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some place mats that wouldn’t slip around on the table. These advertised just that. Upon immediate opening of the package, the material is flimsy and slick. No grip on either side. I immediately placed them back in the package to return. Not slip resistant or non skid at all.
customer_reviews.author: KeyFam

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: These table mats are stunning! I never expected them to look so great since they're only $10 for a set of 4. These mats look like they cost $100, not $10! I got the gold color and theyre beautiful and match my kitchen table perfectly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mikecpa228

customer_reviews.title: Look nicer than the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using these for one week, so know that with regards to my durability rating. They are kind of woven so they cannot be easily ran in a sink, but they can be wiped off. They look very nice, much nicer than the cost, and are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Bent plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a shiny plastic product that comes with the runner folded in half, and then all items rolled tightly together. I do not know how one would remove the runner fold crease. And I expect one would have to weight all items to flatten them.
customer_reviews.author: David Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: We have quartz countertops and I know you’re not supposed to put hot things on the counter. We have hot pads for pans and things like that but I was getting nervous about putting plates out of the microwave on the countertops. I bought these and they’re perfect. I ordered four for the two of us and I just double them up.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Venzke

customer_reviews.title: open mesh
customer_reviews.text: slippery, open mesh. Doesn't stop spills from soaking through to the table. Slips around while you are eating. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: JLW350

customer_reviews.title: Goes with just about everything!
customer_reviews.text: These placemats are very pretty on the table. They are a silvery-grey, but they seem to change color a bit depending on the decor or lighting, looking slightly green or blue at times. They are made of a fine mesh like material making them easy to clean. We are very pleased with these placemats!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and aesthetic Table Runner/Place Mat Set
customer_reviews.text: Love this runner/placemat set!!! It is durable, easy to wipe clean- I even washed the entire set in the washing machine when my toddler spilled chocolate milk over the entire table- and it came out like new! Best part is, it looks as aesthetic as if it came straight from a Pottery Barn catalog. So pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: inmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: Nice color.  I purchased the orange.
customer_reviews.text: They were an awesome price of $10 for 6 of them. I bought two sets. They are bright colored. They lie flat. They don’t slip and slide on table either. I do not know if they are truly heat resistant, as I would never place a hot pan on plastic products.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love these placemats! They are very good quality and in the perfect colour. I recommend that you try them. I could not be happier with my purchase. Thanks for the great placemats!
customer_reviews.author: david jennings hansen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try
customer_reviews.text: Sooo I really like these and I have even reordered them.. but they ain’t perfect! They are plastic so they are washable but .. they do have a lot of grooves so that makes them hard to clean. I have no idea how well they hold up to hear. They are cute and worth a try
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: they look so good
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome. My only objection is I have to use my dish scrubbie in order to clean them. It's a little bit of a pain. Put some black napkins with some silver napkin rings and they are awesome looking
customer_reviews.author: GrandPa  G

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me. I was just looking for placemats that look nice and are durable, which these are great. Do not know about heat resistant since that's no what I use them for. They are durable. I have a cat that like to play with everything and so far these have been able to withstand the nosey cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and attractive table top protector
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking for a synthetic place mat and much better than the old fashion plastic ones. Easy to clean and store when not in use. I have ordered then before and liked so well, I bought more for a second location.
customer_reviews.author: beauty

customer_reviews.title: Look Cheaper Than The Cost
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cheap. Raw, unfinished edges. Looks like they came from $ store. Overpriced. They were laid semi-flat in the box, not folded but still had to weight down to get to lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Great place mats but the color isn’t like the picture on amazon, the color is a dull yellow instead of bright gold. Couldn’t be bothered sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love the design!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design but after reading that some tables got damaged I couldn’t risk ruining my expensive table so I purchased a cloth mat for underneath. Love them though.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Great Placemats!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these placemats! Much better than fabric ones because they wipe clean with a warm damp sponge so easily. They look great on a casually set table and even work with a more formal setting. I’m so happy with them! Color I chose is a chocolate mocha brown. Very versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher of the Year

customer_reviews.title: Mats are eloquent, durable and look great with my place settings.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the place mats, particularly the fact that they are wipeable but yet make a very striking place setting. They go nice with a variety of colored plates.
customer_reviews.author: Lakegirl

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the pattern. But, this seems to be cut from a large roll.. with scissors. One edge is not straight on all 6 of them. Could have done a better job with a precise cut that doesn't leave jagged edge with threads coming out.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dark red and they look exactly as pictured. I was afraid the color would be way off when they arrived. They’re light, simple and easy to clean. Not really the best for kids, as liquid goes right through them, but I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Price for a beautiful Matt
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats for the table they're very beautiful when you get them and and make my kitchen look so beautiful I love it I recommend anybody to buy it it's beautiful in person
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I use placemats not as décor items but to protect my tablecloth. I knew these were "woven" but didn't realize the weave was so open that anything spilled will just run right onto the tablecloth. An example of online shopping that didn't work out well.
customer_reviews.author: Fearless

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I liked most everything about these mats. They are satin so don’t expect bling. Clean nicely and I would purchase again Looks great with the table cloth I purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DenDay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practical people
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom. She loves them! She is a very practical person who never buys anything for herself. We used hand towels before we bought these placemats. But these placemats have changed our dinner hosting game. They are very easy to use and clean, they look very high-quality for a low price, and they are reversible. I will be buying these for my own house someday!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Looks Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get the bang for the buck. I have been doing a lot of entertaining lately and these look like I spent a lot more on my entertaining decor. They have held up well and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for messy eaters. Decoration only.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these aren’t awful. They look decent, but that’s about it. If you spill anything in them it settles into the plastic weaving and then you have to scrub it out at the sink. And then they take FOREVER to dry. The “runner” just looks like 6-7 of the placemats that just didn’t get cut in the die.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and classy style!!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product it looks exactly like the picture! Only downfall is when you have pasta night or any red sauce gets on it it stains and won't wipe clean! It would be perfect for decorating your table or if you don't have little ones..
customer_reviews.author: linda smith

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: lies flat, helps with hot/cold items, and easy to wipe off. small crumbs get stuck and take a little more effort to remove. Since getting it to flatten out after arriving roller up (against instructions, I stuck it in the dryer for a few minutes and promptly took it out), I've used it non-stop.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for what I wanted. I got the white because it looks more silver and it was exactly what I was looking for. It's easy to just wipe off any thing you drop on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Definitely disappointed. I ordered these specifically because it said non- slip. I have little kids...I need them to not slide around the table.
customer_reviews.author: audrey narvaez

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Easily Cleaned
customer_reviews.text: These placemats look very elegant! We have seen similar ones in 5 Star Hotel restaurants! They wipe off easily and can be rinsed under the faucet, towel dried on a flat surface and put back on the table immediately! Very practical and the looks belie the price!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: A HUGE PAIN TO CLEAN !! everything gets in the cracks make sure you put some elbow grease in it and it will come clean though, not kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanyy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: I was hosting friends and family for Christmas 2018. I order last minute when I realize I didn't have any black placemats. I have to say I was very please with the quick shipping and the product was exactly as described. My dinner was a hit and everyone love my table setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great mats, but a bit disappointed with the shipping
customer_reviews.text: We order 2 sets of these mats, the first came in an envelope not folded and were great. The second set came folded and looks pretty bad, we are not satisfied with the second order, can’t seem to get the seam removed, looks awful on the table. Please do not fold these mats when shipping them.. Cleaning the mats seems a bit difficult..
customer_reviews.author: Bobby J

customer_reviews.title: All you really need
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as I need more place mats. Something more durable and easy to clean. It took a bit to get them straight and not curl on one side. The only reason for the 4 stars is they are smaller then my current ones. I would about about 4 inches total in length smaller. Overall great product. Easy to clean and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: The.O

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: These have an open weave that would not protect my table from spills or heat so what is the point of this? Cleaning given the open weave could also be a hassle so they were returned hassle free at Kohl’s.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie'nMe

customer_reviews.title: Look & feel great quality.
customer_reviews.text: There were some silly reviews which almost kept us from ordering this set. I'm glad we did purchased it. They look great, feel great and are easy to wash and air dry.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Good if they fit your needs
customer_reviews.text: They're not going to win any design awards but they look exactly as pictured. Since they're vinyl they're very easy to clean and they also stay in place and help keep dinnerware in place on top of them. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is.... c'mon, it's vinyl. Way overpriced, but the only placemat I could find that met my needs. I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice matches the brown table looks great and it fits well at first i hated the material but its nice and sleek perfect to protect the table from food or spillage easy to clean would say its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

customer_reviews.title: Non slippery and good looking
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen wood table is the slipperiest table ever. It was impossible to eat with a plate directly on the table without a table cloth or something else underneath the plate. With these, however, nothing has slipped away, even when I'm eating a particularly hard steak.
customer_reviews.author: André Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table Setting
customer_reviews.text: I bought the place mats and was very pleased with them. They look even better than they did in the picture! Definitely a must buy if you are looking to add elegance to your table setting.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Truth be told, I bought these placemats to go under my cats' food and water bowls. They are purrfect! Easy to clean and durable. They lie flat and blend in with the floors. The tight weave traps all food particles. I highly recommend - even for humans!
customer_reviews.author: CBCTUTOR

customer_reviews.title: Add the matching placemats to cart!:)
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely stunning in person! No regrets! Such a complimentary piece! And I am so happy that I purchased the placemats to match!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Asia-Su'a

customer_reviews.title: Great placemats!
customer_reviews.text: Great placemats! Hard to see stains due to the dark color, and great durability and heat protection. I'm very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get them to use but I got then because they matched my decor and I must say they look beautiful and the different colors woven where spot on for the look I was looking for....
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good for looks not for use
customer_reviews.text: They match the color and look that I wanted but not good if you’re trying to protect your wood dinner table. Everything leaks through
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brenhaug

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for dining table! Pairs great with a set of brown leather coasters I bought from Amazon as well. I have a fairly large wood dining table and the runner fits all the way across...was going to cut it down but I like the way it hangs. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Kiwistrwberry82

customer_reviews.title: They do slip!
customer_reviews.text: I chose them because they were listed as non-slip. They do slip. They might not slip if they were on a rough textured surface like a coarsely woven cotton cloth, but on a flat surface, they slip. And they slip badly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The color is what I wanted. The mats are easy to clean, just wipe off with damp cloth. Have put nothing hotter than a plate of food on them, so do not know about heat resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Long

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these. Was going to return because they looked cheap through the plastic. Thankfully I took them out if the plastic. Exactly what I was looking for. Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use them outside on my bar and pub table, they add style and are much better looking and easier than the woven mats. I roll them up when finished and store them in a bin under the bar. They lay flat and wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley W.

product_meta.title: U'Artlines Placemat, Crossweave Woven Vinyl Non-Slip Insulation Placemat Washable Table Mats Set of 6 (6pcs placemats, Grey)
feature_bullets: Material:PVC,Size in:18"X12"(45cmX30cm),Set of 6, choose the color and set you need.
Simple, but exquisite design, Eco-friendly PVC materials. Great colors, Prefect additions for your dinner table.
Stylish placemats would be a good decoration and life quatity of your home,dining hall, kitchen,hotel and business office.
All placemats are cut by hand and maybe one or two inches error.This will not affect daily use. All placemats comes with U'Artlines lable and package way.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars5,183 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
